name: test-group/test-000
description: This is a simple test to demonstrate the auto-loading functionality of PHP Composer.

start: sh -c 'if [ -x ./lib/tailwindcss/tailwindcss-linux-x64 ]; then ./lib/tailwindcss/tailwindcss-linux-x64 -i ./src/main/resources/css/main-style.rez.css -o ./public/resources/css/main-style.rez.css --watch; else echo "~Tailwind CSS not found for linux"; fi'

start cmd /c "if exist .\lib\tailwindcss\tailwindcss-windows-x64.exe (.\lib\tailwindcss\tailwindcss-windows-x64.exe -i .\src\main\resources\css\main-style.rez.css -o .\public\resources\css\main-style.rez.css --watch) else (echo ~Tailwind CSS not found for windows)"
